alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 12 at 3:30AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around 0.5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will likely begin Friday morning or early afternoon but will likely not accumulate on surfaces until later Friday evening. Freezing rain may begin Friday night, continuing through Saturday. Uncertainty remains high regarding exact snow and ice amounts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon
